name: 楊安石
objective:
本課程實習內容主要包含冷凍空調節能技術；動態節能模擬分析；無塵室節能技術；潔淨能源(諸如太陽能、風能、燃料電池等)技術。
This practice course mainly contains: energy-saving technology in refrigeration and air conditioning, dynamic energy simulation, energy-saving technology in cleanrooms and clean energy (such as solar energy, wind energy, and fuel cell, etc).
